org.galiosten.calculator.model

Class VariableNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.galiosten.calculator.model.Node
      • org.galiosten.calculator.model.VariableNode

  • public class VariableNode
extends Node
    The VariableNode represents a variable that will have its value set during the evaluation of a Let expression. Since variables are globally scoped, values for variables are cached once set, but can be overridden in subsequent expressions.
    Author:
    rbets

        Overrides:

      • evaluate

        public java.lang.Integer evaluate()
        Returns the result of evaluating this Node. Returns the result of the expression associated with the variable, or the cached value if present. If there is an expression associated with this variable, the result of the expression evaluation is cached, overriding any previously cached value for this variable.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class Node
        Returns:
        the result of evaluating this Node
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this VariableNode is associated with more than one expression.
